news.title: Twitter Is Testing a Way to Let You Limit Replies to Your Tweets
news.description: Twitter is experimenting with giving users the ability to limit who can reply to their Tweets, which can include all users, only people they follow, or only people that they directly mention.

news.title: LinkedIn Now Factors ‘Dwell Time’ Into Its Algorithm
news.description: In order to offer users the content that is most valuable to them, LinkedIn is now integrating how long a user spends with a piece into its algorithm, along with likes and other interactions.

news.title: Facebook & Instagram Let Businesses Sell Products Directly on Their Page
news.description: New features including Facebook Shops and Instagram Shop aim to make e-commerce more seamless by allowing users to purchase products from within their social media accounts.

news.title: Facebook Says It Will Permanently Shift Tens of Thousands of Jobs to Remote Work
news.description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg stated that over the next five to ten years, he envisions a large proportion of the company shifting to remote work, starting with current open positions.
